comments: Definitely avoid this professor. He has some misogynistic tendencies, and honestly he didnt teach anything. If you want to learn, take Schumann\'s class. If you just want to get by then yeah, take this class, but honestly, if you are paying over 1k for it, why would you want a crappy professor?

comments: I will suggest not to take his class. For following reasons His teaching style is continuous bombardment of theories with no deep dive of the applications For a buss comm class he is a tough grader. Even with full participation he does not give full grades. Donald Schumann\'s class is better to take for Bus9553

comments: Great professor, learned a lot of valuable skills from him. This was a Continuing Education course, so the setup was different. However, if I have to take a business course at Baruch or NYU, I would choose him.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Prof. Misercola is the greatestest professor! He is very very very encouraging. He wants us to succeed in our own way using our best ability. His C-Suite class inspires me to become one of promising future leaders for my people. Engage and learn so much from him, he will help you to succeed if you take his class seriously.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Really amazing professor. Very helpful in helping students improve their oral and written communication skills. His comments on presentations/written assignments have been invaluable in helping me, as well as my fellow classmates, improve. Also, you can resubmit assignments if you aren\'t happy with your grade. One of my favorite professors.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Considering that he has very little control over the assignments & content, he made the class as interesting as he could. Grading was easy for the written parts (you can resubmit). He\'s a little picky about presenting styles, but feedback was helpful. Class is basically a repeat of BusComm 1, so don\'t expect too much. Recommend, esp. in the summer.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Mark is an amazing professor. He is engaging and will keep you from falling asleep during a 0 credit class. Each assignment will be graded and you\'re given the chance to redo/resubmit with his suggested edits for a higher grade. Very helpful, very positive and very motivating. Took him for both Bus Comm classes and highly recommend you do too!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Great Professor. Very helpful and constructive. Can resubmit your work to get an A. Very respectful of his students.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Caring (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)
comments: Best teacher to take for bus com hands down. Easygoing, pleasant, flexible, constructive. Tries his hardest to make the class relevant to you getting hired (something the curriculum doesn\'t focus on). Lets you resubmit work if you want to get an A. Cares genuinely about you.
